featured.text: The Icelandic project, from which this pioneering procedure emerged, strives for making a fundamental change in the marine industry.
What does “this pioneering procedure” in the second paragraph refer to? (A) 100% Fish’s mission.

definition.zh_def: 開拓者；先驅者，指在某一領域或活動中率先探索或發展的人。
definition.en_def: A person who is among the first to explore or settle a new area or to develop a new field or activity.
definition.example: She was a pioneer in the field of renewable energy.
